channel.title: Dynamic Minecraft [Towny] [Survival] [Pvp] [1.6.2]
channel.description:
We are an ongoing survival server with some unique features. We believe in the Minecraft dream. Where you can build a simple house, or build a skyscraper into the clouds. The sky is the limit in Dynamic Minecraft.
We don't have annoying whitelists. You come, you read the quick tutorials, follow the rules, and you're set. It's that easy!
If you'd like to see the true potential of the server, come check us out!
Visit our website at www.dynamicminecraft.net !
